text:
e="preserve">Dai Yuanben (; July 31, 1928 – September 26, 2020) was a Chinese physicist. He was a member of the 7th, 8th and 9th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. He was born in Nanjing, China. In 1980, he became a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
Dai died on September 26, 2020 in Beijing at the age of 92.
